thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding service
thread.title_full: Outstanding service - Review of Four Seasons Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Dave O
title: Outstanding service
text:
From the pick up at the airport through absolutely every aspect of the Four Seasons Hotel, the service, amenities and room were outstanding.
I booked my trip as a result of a change in plans and had to visit 30 different locations over 3 days
Herri, the concierge obtained all the addresses whilst Driver Lee put them into a practical driving order for each day
I was accompanied by a very proficient and fun interpreter called Jacque whom Herri had also arranged for me
Throughout the whole 3 days everything ran extremely smoothly and efficiently thanks to the great work from all the staff at the hotel but especially from those I mentioned
Great work - I would if really struggled without them
